get.summary: Gets all Local Admins with properties

parameters.description: Username of the administrator to be deleted

authenticationMode.description: Enumeration of Authentication mode of the CIFS server

authenticationModeString.description: Localized representation of the authentication model

smbSigningRequired.description: True if the server must require SMB signing from clients else optional field.

cifsFriendlyName.description: If the authentication mode is None or User. CIFS friendly name of the server

cifsWorkgroup.description: If the authentication mode is None or User. Workgroup the server belongs to

adDomain.description: If the authenticationMode is AD. The active directory domain

adDomainStatus.description: Enumeration of Status of the AD domain connection

adDomainStatusString.description: Localized representation of the AD domain connection status

adDomainController.description: If the authentication mode is AD and the domain status is connected. The Domain controller

adDomainControllerAddress.description: If the authentication mode is AD .The network address of the AD domain controller

healthLevel.description: The health level of the service

healthLevelString.description: Localized representation of the service health

nasStatus.description: Enumeration of the status of the service

nasStatusString.description: Localized string detailing the status of the service

repHealthLevel.description: Represents the rolled up replication health level of the service

repHealthLevelString.description: Localized representation of the replication health level of the service

repStatus.description: Enumeration of the rolled up replication status of the service

repStatusString.description: Localized string detailing the replication status of the service

maxShares.description: Maximum number of shares that can be created in this service

numRemainingShares.description: Number of new shares that could be created before hitting the max shares limit

healthLevel.description: Enumeration of the health level of a share

healthLevelString.description: Localized representation of the share health

shareStatus.description: Enumeration of the status of a NAS Share

shareStatusString.description: Localized string detailing the status of the share

filesystemInitialisationPercent.description: Progress of filesystem metadata Initialisation as a percentage value

accessProtocol.description: Enumeration of Access Data Protocol of the share

accessProtocolString.description: Localized representation of the access protocol

authenticationModeString.description: Localized representation of the authentication mode

writeProtectionEnabled.description: True if the share is read-only

encryptionEnabled.description: True if the shares data should be written to disk encrypted

deduplicationEnabled.description: True if the share data should be deduped

userBytes.description: The total size of the user data that has been stored in the share before dedupe

diskBytes.description: The actual size of the data stored in the share after dedupe

dedupeRatio.description: The dedupe ratio of the data stored in the share

numFiles.description: The number of files in the share

numDirectories.description: The number of directories in the share

secureEraseMode.description: Enumeration of secure erase mode of the share

secureEraseModeString.description: Localized representation of the secure erase mode

sizeOnDiskQuotaEnabled.description: Check if Quota policy for size on disk is enabled

sizeOnDiskQuotaBytes.description: Size on disk Quota limit policy

userDataStoredQuotaEnabled.description: Check if Quota policy for user data is enabled

backupApplication.description: Enumeration of backup Application used for this share

backupApplicationString.description: Localized representation of the backup Application

backupApplicationOther.description: User provided value of the backup application if set to Other

backupDataType.description: Enumeration of type of backup data stored in this share

backupDataTypeString.description: Localized representation of the backup data type

backupDataTypeOther.description: User provided value of the backup data type if set to Other

authenticationMode.description: Enumeration of authentication mode used for the share

nextPageUri.description: Provided if more members are available

total.description: Total number of members that are available

period.description: Period this sample represents, in seconds

userBytes.description: Amount of user data stored in Bytes

diskBytes.description: Amount of disk capacity used in Bytes

period.description: Period this sample represents, in seconds

numDedupeSessions.description: The number of dedupe sessions currently running.

numBmSessions.description: The number of buffer manager sessions currently running

numOpenFileDescriptors.description: Maximum number of concurrent open FDs in the given interval

numOpenFileDescriptorsPeak.description: The number of peak open file descriptors

numDedupeSessionsPeak.description: The number of peak open dedupe sessions

period.description: Period this sample represents, in seconds

transmittedThroughput.description: Average share read throughput in Bytes per second

receivedThroughput.description: Average share write throughput in Bytes per second

numOpenFileDescriptors.description: Number of open file descriptors, sampled every 5 seconds and averaged across the timestamp

numDedupeSessions.description: The number of dedupe sessions currently running

numOpenFileDescriptorsPeak.description: The number of peak open file descriptors

numDedupeSessionsPeak.description: The number of peak open dedupe sessions

shareId.description: ID of the share these permissions are for

name.description: CIFS username or NFS hostname that the permission belongs to

userId.description: If authentication mode is User, the CIFS user ID

hostId.description: If authentication mode is Host, the NFS host ID

authenticationModeString.description: Localized representation of the authentication mode

readOnlyPermission.description: If the authentication mode is Host. True if the user has read permission on the share

readWritePermission.description: True if the user has read/write permission on the share.

rootSquashEnabled.description: If the authentication mode is Host. True if the NFS root_squash property is enabled for the specified user

nfsSecureEnabled.description: If the authentication mode is Host. False if the NFS insecure property is set for the specified user

wdelayEnabled.description: If the authentication mode is Host. False if the NFS no_wdelay property is set for the specified user

readdirplusEnabled.description: If the authentication mode is Host. False if the NFS nordirplus property is set for the specified user

total.description: Total number of members that are available
